naslov: SPLIT, KAMENA KUĆA U BLIZINI DIOKLECIJANOVE PALAČE (prodaja)
opis: Posredujemo u prodaji prekrasne kamene kuće nedaleko od Dioklecijanove palače. Kuća se proteže na 75 m2 stambenog prostora na dvije etaže. Sastoji se od kuhinje, blagovaonice s dnevnim boravkom, kupaonice u prizemlju te dvije spavaće sobe na katu povezane unutarnjim stepenicama. Prostor je potpuno klimatiziran te kompletno opremljen. Ispred se nalazi velika natkrivena terasa s vanjskim kaminom i ograđenim vrtom te spremište. Postoji mogućnost kupnje garsonjere od 27 m2 u susjednom objektu po cijeni od 150.000 €. Kuća ima svoj vlastiti ulaz iako se radi o lokaciji stare jezgre gdje su uglavnom smještene tradicionalne dalmatinske kamene kuće u uskim ulicama. Lokacija je idealna jer omogućava brz pristup glavnim turističkim atrakcijama, restoranima, plažama i šetnicama. Autobusni i željeznički kolodvor se nalaze na 10 minuta hoda, a zračna luka je udaljena 25 km. Najvažniji sadržaji poput Dioklecijanove palače čine ovu nekretninu još atraktivnijom za turiste željne istraživanja kulturne baštine. Nedaleko je smješten  park šuma Marijan za ljubitelje prirode, te poznata pješčana plaža Bačvice. Investiranje u ovu katnicu ne samo da pruža priliku za dobar povrat ulaganja kroz turistički najam, već nezaboravan doživljaj mediteranskog života u srcu grada. Razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani Ugovor o posredovanju a što je u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Agencijska provizija je 3% Kontakt: 091/561-5115 ŽELJANA We are mediating the sale of a beautiful stone house not far from Diocletian's Palace. The house covers 75 m2 of living space on two floors. It consists of a kitchen, a dining room with a living room, a bathroom on the ground floor and two bedrooms on the first floor connected by internal stairs. The space is fully air-conditioned and fully equipped. In front there is a large covered terrace with an outdoor fireplace and a fenced garden and a storage room. There is a possibility to buy apartment of 27 m2 for price of 150.000 €. The house has its own entrance, even though it is located in the old town, where traditional Dalmatian stone houses are mostly located in narrow streets. The location is ideal as it provides quick access to the main tourist attractions, restaurants and beaches and promenades The bus and train stations are a 10-minute walk away, and the airport is 25 km away. The most important facilities such as Diocletian's Palace make this property even more attractive for tourists eager to explore cultural heritage. Marijan forest park for nature lovers and the famous sandy beach of Bačvice are located nearby. Investing in this apartment not only provides an opportunity for a good return on investment through tourist rental, but also an unforgettable experience of Mediterranean life in the heart of the city. Viewing the property is only possible with a signed Brokerage Agreement, which is in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Real Estate Brokerage Act. Agency commission is 3% Contact: 091/561-5115 ŽELJANA
